timeline.message: improve check for membership of the same package in the reference creator

timeline.bodyText: Won't this also match when to is in a sub package as well, i.e. to = "foo/bar/baz/SomeClass" and from = "foo/bar/OtherClass" ?
timeline.author: bantonsson

timeline.bodyText: Could we pull out the getInternalName() calls? Even though they're just substring calls it feels unnecessary.
timeline.author: bantonsson

replies.bodyText: Yes, I hadn't realised this was allocating a substring every time (this was just a search for all String.replaceAll after yesterday's find) - I've changed things to avoid calling it more often than necessary.
replies.author: richardstartin

timeline.message: pull repetitive calls to Type.getInternalName(), which allocates a substring each time it's called
remove inefficient use of String.replaceAll in Google HTTP client instrumentation
pull repetitive calls to Type.getInternalName(), which allocates a substring each time it's called

timeline.bodyText: could this use url.replace("%20", "+") since it's just a literal replacement and no regex is involved?
timeline.author: mcculls

replies.author: richardstartin

replies.bodyText: thanks, I'd forgotten JDK8 still used that approach
replies.author: mcculls
